alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Carbon and west central Albany Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Elk Mountain to 6 miles northeast of North Fork Campground. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hanna, Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain and Arlington. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 249 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range
